name: Darryl ANDERSON, Appellant v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS Jeffrey A. Beard Secretary S.C.I. Huntingdon Record Office, Appellees

parties: Darryl ANDERSON, Appellant v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS Jeffrey A. Beard Secretary S.C.I. Huntingdon Record Office, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 7th day of February 2011, the above captioned appeal is hereby quashed for failure to file a brief.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
12 A.3d 746
Darryl ANDERSON, Appellant v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS Jeffrey A. Beard Secretary S.C.I. Huntingdon Record Office, Appellees.
No. 43 EAP 2010.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 7, 2011.
